Texts.Text: A bit of signage to cheaply embellish your city.
A few signs and paving variations.
All you need to design a small plaza in your city.
A very elegant pack of mosaics and colonnades for a beautiful esplanade.
The latest creation to bring clean water to your city with a flourish.
Columns and channels to match the ancient style.
A couple of unique buildings for the gates of your city.
A few aesthetic additions for the water features of your city.
Buildings and pavillions to create a beautiful annexe for your World's Fair.
Mostly mechanical tools of little value.
First-hand equipment to reinforce your buildings and production.
Low quality seeds that still ensure your crops grow where you desire them to.
Some advanced technology to enhance your production.
The product of the latest research in chemistry.
The best tools and structures to reinforce your production.
A selection of newly designed machines that use electricity to achieve miracles.
All you need for a very efficient and modern farming industry.
The latest inventions of the most talented engineers of the era.
A few old possessions and statues of little value.
The spartan possessions of an ancient warrior.
The remains of a modest tomb.
Old writings, some of which are now of great value.
Some remains that once belonged to a wealthy person.
Funerary textiles buried with a noble in her tomb.
A pack of bones from creatures long gone.
Legendary artifacts that no one thought could be real.
The remains of the greatest constructions of the past.
The wild and rampant species of grassy field.
A collection of trees from across all continents.
Grown in water, fully or partially.
Half trees, half flower, but wholly beautiful.
A fine set of colourful and perfumed flowers.
Rare flowers and plants from the tropics.
Plants both giant and striking in appearance.
Plants known only in myths. Could they be real after all?
Short-ranged echo-locator that reveals nearby quest objectives, treasures, and mines.
Old Nate's first attempt at mapping the depths using sound.
A Few Screws Short Of A Toolshed
Medium-ranged echo-locator that reveals nearby quest objectives, treasures, and mines.
An improved version of Old Nate's echo-ranger, with more bells and whistles.
Long-ranged echo-locator that reveals nearby quest objectives, treasures, and mines.
Sound out even the most sunken of sunken treasures with this subsurface detector — an innovation in sea surveying far ahead of its time.
Allows the ship to attack without need of a state of war in diplomacy.
Even the crew now think they're pirates.
Map of Willie Wibblesock's Wondrous Stash (The Old World)
Map of Isabel Sarmento's Emergency Vault (The New World)
Map of Vicente Silva's Sunken Ship-of-the-Line (Cape Trelawney)
Your buildings and ships repair themselves even during combat.
Map of an Inuit Dispute (The Arctic)
Map of a Domestic Skirmish (The Old World)
Map of a Rebel Incursion (The New World)
Map of a Trelawney Skirmish (Cape Trelawney)
Room At The Inn 1 — A Refuge
Room At The Inn 2 — A Purpose
Burden of a Lifetime 2 — Toy Box
Burden of a Lifetime 3 — The Fight Goes On
Burden of a Lifetime 5 — A Truth Shared
Burden of a Lifetime 1 — Cause for Contemplation
A game of cat and mouse
Contains an abundance of useful repair tools.
Map of Old Nate's Prototype Airship Crash Site (The Arctic)
Map of a Ghost Ship Sighting (The Arctic)
Map of a Sunken Royal Clipper (The Old World)
Map of a Sunken Rebel Supply Ship (The New World)
Map of a Sunken La Corona Clipper (Cape Trelawney)
The Executioner's Mask 2 — Error of Judgement
The Floating City — A Hulking Shell
Provides a boost to the speed of your steamship.
Adipose Compounds And Dunes: A Two-mass Binding Model.
Children's Charity 1 — Charity Begins At Home
In Love With The Devil 3 — Heartbreak
Bente's Tip-Top Expedition 4 — The Curse of Choice
Slimy Seduction 4 — An Offer He Cannot Accept
In Love With The Devil 1 — Bride-To-Be
An army marches on its stomach
A game of cat and mouse
War And Peace 2 — Thanks But No Thanks
A game of cat and mouse
A game of cat and mouse
A game of cat and mouse
A game of cat and mouse
A game of cat and mouse
A game of cat and mouse
A game of cat and mouse
All your crew needs to repair modern ships in battle.
In the Name of the Father 4 - The Steward
Provides a significant boost to the speed of your steamship.
An abundance of repair tools on wheels, to help keep your ship in shape.
An exceptional design that gives your steamship an extra bit of oomph when it needs it the most.
Ernest Poppinjay based his system for moving ship repair tools on the dumb waiter that brought him breakfast.
Welcome to the Truth 3 — The Question
Welcome to the Truth 1 — The Test
Pour, Oh Pour, The Pirate Rum
They linger high and vivid in the night sky.
Me Old Mum — When Smoke Gets in Your Eyes
Me Old Mum — A Taste of Their Own Medicine
Me Old Mum — A Man Needs a Mum
A Ghostly Encounter 4 — The Spirit Shows Itself!
The Prestige 1 — They Do It With Mirrors
To fish, throw dynamite into the sea with a left-click.
An explosive gift from Aarhant's emergency supplies.
Brings scores of fascinating marine creatures to the surface.
Shoots a projectile in an arc that explodes on impact.
Effective as ever, these mortars can be mounted onto your ship to bombard your enemies from above with explosive shells.
Has the miraculous power to draw the most bizarre abyssal creatures in creation to the surface.
Shoots a torpedo that explodes on target location.

Bluehead's avant-garde torpedo will revolutionise your naval offensive with its compressed air underwater propelling and its precise explosive warhead thanks to its gyroscopic course-correction system.
Dinky magnet that draws up dross. Demagnetizes over time.
A big magnet that attracts the attention of some really great junk. Demagnetizes over time.
Nate stroked this monster magnet with his master magnet. Expect to find the ripest, rustiest junk going. Demagnetizes over time.
Sifts the seabed for ancient artifacts.
Sifts a large area of the seabed for obscure and ancient artifacts.
Sifts a very large area of the seabed, revealing remarkable artifacts that incrustations have long kept concealed.
For scraping the bottom of the barrel.
A slightly more ambitious dredge of Old Nate's, designed to plumb deeper water for sunken machinery.
Old Nate's most far-reaching scavenging dredge, designed to plumb the ocean's deepest trenches for sunken machinery.
Increases your prospects of striking gold.
A bit of hip-wiggle in this iteration seems to attract even more gold.
This model is the gold standard. Simply pour black gold in and get gold gold out.
A sideline in copper and zinc.
A proper cropper of zinc and copper.
One of Old Nate's more down-to-earth inventions. Gathers precious metals at a remarkable rate.
Ensures not a drop goes to waste.
Gathers fossil goop the average sucker might miss.
Only five star crude will pass this extractor's exacting selection process.
Places a mine below the surface that explodes on enemy proximity.
Blows up one in every ten passing ships (probably).
Bigger and prongier. Adds a bit of froth and fizz to the mix whenever its destructive services are called upon.
A mine of monstrous size and ferocity, whose horns really hertz. Look close, and you can see steam puffing from its wetted nostrils.
Does a little pivot before firing.
Nine Lives 2 — Land On Your Feet
Nine Lives 3 — The Ninth Life of the Cat
In Love With The Devil 4 — An Uninvited Guest
In Love With The Devil 5 — Mr. Bingles' Bungle
Moral Panic 3 — The Scales of Anubis
Moral Panic 4 — Rock and a Hard Place
The ship shoots special chain projectiles, severely slowing the enemy.
A man walks into a bar.... Ouch.
The end of the revolution party!
Ship Drop - Carl Leonard von Malching
Going up in Smoke 2 — Ship to Ship
A Man of Noble Intentions 3 — Obligate Noblesse
A Man of Noble Intentions 4 — A King Without a Castle
A Man of Noble Intentions 5 — Castles in the Sky
A Man of Noble Intentions 6 — Baron Von Malching
Going up in Smoke 1 — The Master of the Stock Market
A Man of Noble Intentions 1 — Sweet Talk
Hostile Takeover - Carl Leonard von Malching
Bombards your enemies from above with explosive shells.
Hook's devastating mortar bombards your enemies from above with myriad explosive shells.
I'm here on Her Majesty's business!
Fires a barrage of 5 projectiles in an arc, with each exploding on impact.
Leaves the enemy feeling utterly mortified!
Fires a fast projectile in a straight line that explodes on impact.
Gives the cabin boy something to fire!
Its smoking barrel smells of campaign and conquest.
Mäuser's heavy siege howitzer is designed for attacking the very latest ships and naval fortifications.
Launches a torpedo that explodes upon reaching the target.
Its path remains true, no matter the weather.
Dr. Mercier's Feverishly Federating Flag of the Free
Lets ships spit flames, setting their enemies ablaze.
Upon seeing Dr. Mercier's flag flapping from your ships, there is every chance of the enemy hopping on to your bandwagon…
Overwhelms the enemy with attacks, slowing their movement and attack speed.
Prevents the ship from getting attacked, but also prevents it attacking.
And it gets you good deals as well...
A frightening innovation that breathes fire upon the enemy.
Your ship will explode in 10 seconds, dealing area damage to enemies based on your ship's hitpoints.
Discharges a bomb that explodes after a short delay.
If for any reason the books and pamphlets aren't working...
No Gods, No Masters 2 — An Eye for an Eye
No Gods, No Masters 3 — Trust Issues
The sinister flame-projecting machine of a fire-worshipping cult. Handle with care, in case their zeal is contagious.
Fires an incendiary projectile that spreads fire on impact.
Big enough to bring the house of the Royal Council down — just don't fluff it, or they'll be celebrating your failure forever.
It's only a matter of time before great change erupts!
Only the invisible pilots steering a course to anarchy can avoid collisions with these invisible terrors!
Accidents happen, and your toffs know it.
Not so keen on cocktails now, are they!? Hehehee.
Looks like Cinderella better think twice about going to that ball...
This could be a (very) sudden solution to all the problems of capitalism.
The Promise Trust 3 — Ready to Influence
The Promise Trust 4 — The Finishing Touches
The Promise Trust 1 — The Main Event
Its secret was a mouldy petri dish!
That'll stop them foaming at the mouth!
A cocktail from your kitchen cupboard.
A marvellous and most modern vapouriser!
Very good at putting out fires.
Oxford Electric Bell - The Sill Running Clock

Thanks to the Oxford Electric Bell you can forget about shirkers forever! The still running clock will only require a power outlet to keep track of your workforce hours, ensuring they will not miss a single minute of their shift!
Can't bounce back without caoutchouc? Get tacky rivers of white gold flowing from these superior caoutchouc saplings!
A worker's gift. "Just in case you have to wake us up, boss. We can be bunch of sleepyheads sometimes..."
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Take these coffee beans with you and never miss a cup.
Need power but there's no powerplant in sight? That is exactly what dynamos were invented for! Disclaimer: may occasionally combust.
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Bring your population back to life with these coffee beans.
Welcome to the Truth 4 — The Answer
Generate stable electricity anywhere! Our Steam Turbines will safely and conveniently power up your buildings wherever they are, no connection to electricity towers required!
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Export the fragrant, delicious pungency of these select coffee beans to put a toasted full stop on morning drowsiness.
If you're feeling corny, bring these mixed corn seeds with you to grow the golden tidbits.
If you're feeling corny, plant these seeds and watch them become a steady supply of shiny ears of corn.
Are you feeling corny? Plant these selected corn seeds and soon you will be buried in mountains of sweet golden kernels!
Piersons annouces his latest invention: the Turbo Generator! Its innovative system of turbine stages guarantees the highest safety, efficiency and power supply the market has to offer!
These saplings can help you grow a few plantain groves in alien soil.
These saplings can help you grow plentiful plantain groves in alien soil.
These saplings have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased yield of plantain!
Your metallurgical industries need a boost? For only a little more damage to the environment, this calciner will improve the refining process.
This spawn can help you grow a small colony of oysters in unfamiliar waters.
This spawn can help you grow a large colony of oysters in unfamiliar waters.
Your heavy industries will revere this furnace! An advanced smelting process that will make your produce much sturdier and your workers' lives much easier.
These oysters have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of seas, and with an increased yield!
Bessamer Converter - The First Non-Expensive Industrial Process
Pricey molten processes are a thing of the past now thanks to the Bessamer converter, a furnace that will increase the scale and speed of your heavy industries' production like nothing ever before!
Need extra help in your processing factories? For a small cost, a planer will make metal cutting faster and enhance production.
Makes it look like your premises are all above board.
Talking Device (TBC - Quest not yet written)
Bring In the devil (TBC - Quest not yet written)
Juvenile Detention (TBC - Quest not yet written)
Conflict of Interest (TBC - Quest not yet written)
Break Out (TBC - Quest not yet written)
Royal Inspection 2 — The Inspection (TBC - Quest not yet written)
Breakout sustain 2 (TBC - Quest not yet written)
Brekaout destory 3 (TBC - Quest not yet written)
Convicted Maid (TBC - Quest not yet written) FORCED
The Pit and The Pendulum 1 — Condemned
Tired of wasting time on metal cutting? Upgrade your processing industries with a helical planer and speed up this annoying task!
You can make everything on the cheap, and no-one has to know.
The Cutting Edge - The Fastest Metal Cutting Machine
You've never seen a faster metal cutting machine! Implement The Cutting Edge now in your processing factories and let electricity do all the work!
Von Malching fought hard at the council to ensure children might also enjoy supervisory roles in factories.
Has caught at least three fish, that's three times as much as the average citizen.
Lily has never been afraid to experiment with different styles.
An investment that provides your people with the ways and means to combat a blaze.
Franke is an alchemist of textiles, with dedication, skilled artistry and years of experience in turning fur to cotton and back again!
Put this millstone to work and lift that one from around your neck!
Better factory materials cost more money, but it's bound to be worth it in the end, argues Lord Fizgig.
The world runs on money, not oxygen!
Don't let anybody stop you burning coal, even if it looks gruesome!
This French Burrstone will pulverise all your grinding issues to a fine, delicate mist!
"This is the era of industrialisation! To hell with the tree-hugging leaf-lickers!", declares Lord Footprint.
Makes the city air cleaner at night.
Grinding Machine Lieberman - The First Machine with a Coolant
The fantastic Grinding Machine Lieberman can grind anything and everything in a matter of seconds! The ultimate addition to your milling factories!
Pollution Ban at Night and Noon
The difference in the city air is like night and day.
Miss Green's clever measures to reduce smog can save our species from extinction!
Knows what a pearl looks like, unlike the last guy.
Workers are enthused by the new system of written labour notes to reward their efforts.
Precise chemical processing calls for precise measuring equipment, like this mercury thermometer.
A new and better printing machine helps distribute labour notes to workers at no maintenance cost!
The labour notes are now so beautifully typeset and presented, they really look like they're worth something! A sign of the wonders of anarchy to come!
Another ruined batch in your chemical processing factories? This advanced melting point apparatus will rid your clueless workforce of having to guess the temperature ever again.
The people own what they produce! They should be free to join a great queue to collect their quota!
Lady Jane Smythe - Queen of Haute Couture
Lady Smythe has seen a world of colour she wishes to unite — and in doing so, create fashions entirely new.
Portrait of the Artist as an Old Man 1 — The Artist
The people need somewhere they feel comfortable sharing ideas to help economise during production!
Can't imagine life without his ankles wet.
An airy space, not at all empty, but brimming with ideas for economisation! Self-sufficiency; over-abundance! Those are the topics for discussion at this venue's very functional table.
Thiele Tube - The Most Accurate Melting Point Measurement System

As far as temperature measuring tools go, no other matches the precision of the Thiele Tube. The frighteningly accurate system will ensure your chemical processing factories perform at frighteningly productive rates.
If your wood production is see-sawing, see to it with this bow saw.
Sometimes forgets he's got actual legs.
A man with an infectious, impetuous and impassioned urge for action.
His hats always come with a chin strap.
This unpredictable prototype was originally built to gain an unfair advantage at steam car races.
Nothing brings two people together as sharing a two-man saw. Bonding while working works for all of the parts involved!
A reinforced variant, which in spite of the minor combustion risk, takes all the labour out of warehouse work.
Old Nate's baby. Prone to the odd tantrum, but provides the lift everyone needs in times of logistical disconsolation.
For her, the poncho represents a tradition spanning many aeons.
Some say there's a tiny boy inside pulling the levers...
Has sailed seven seas pursuing the mighty beasts.
Why do it by hand when the Vaughan Drag Saw can do it for you? Using nothing but electricity, this unbelievable automatic saw can cut five times faster than any hand saw!
Compensates for its faithfulness in performing simple human tasks by being wilfully blind.
The crew knows him as Steel Lungs.
Set this trap and leave it overnight. Chances are you'll find something the next day. Then again, maybe you won't.
The nearest thing Nate has to a companion. Unlike a human servant, it won't complain when he kicks it for setting things on fire.
Instead of its usual workforce, the building employs Jornalero Workforce.
For all he has achieved, you have to take your hat off to him.
So the blue cable to the yellow pin... Oh wait... Or was it red?
Some might call it cruelty, we like to call it effective! No beast, big or small, can evade the toothy grip of this leghold trap, and your hunters don't need to move a muscle.
The persistent screech this extra-powerful contraption generates cannot be normal...
Have a case of scrawny hares? Say goodbye to your hairy problems! This fur stretcher will immensely increase the fur surface of even the tiniest of prey!
The enthusiast's choice. Old Nate neglected to include an operating manual, meaning there's a chance of the odd accident.
Mariana is the model designer; her new world themes are the future of fashion.
Woods taking up too much land? Keep your groves at bay with these secateurs.
Her fellow sailors swear she grows gills in the water.
Want to increase your woods' efficiency, but reduce their area? You don't have to choose thanks to these convenient loppers.
Grab even more with each fell swoop.
These tricky lobster nippers could sneak mice out from their slippers, or tip some salted kippers on some drippy tallship skippers.
Original LÖWE - The World's First Anvil Pruner
Introducing the Original Lowe! The most advanced pruning tool that can cut cleanly and with barely any effort thanks to its anvil system! Your woodlands have never been more efficient!
Clever use of water's potential energy to generate electricity.
Are your farms in need of some fresh air? This plough can give your soil a breather.
Cristobal Balenciaga Eizaguirre - The Trend Inventor
The one true couturier, his designs turn out their wearer's souls. Never ask him how Malching's fitting went.
This advanced hydroelectric paddlewheel is immune to rust and corrosion, if not the odd explosion.
This cast steel plough can multiply the toil of one farmer by four, so they have more time for sowing and tending to crops.
Captain Moby - Old Dog of the Sea
The relentless Captain of the Pequed who took his crew to the ends of the earth in his pursuit to catch the greatest whale alive.
This unique hydroelectric generator has a gold plaque inscribed with its inventor's motto: "Consequences be dammed! Ha! — N8"
Welcome to the 19th Century, when machines can do all the work for you! These steel seed drills sow your crops faster, more efficiently and probably better than any human being can.
Susannah Brightwoman, A Glimmer In The Darkness
Joined after you helped the Queen at Trelawney. Formerly of the Royal Mint, the Queen sent Susannah to make your gold go further.
Only needs a nice pebble, a hook and some schnapps to make you an earring.
A farmer's gift. "This beauty was vital for many a harvest. I hope it will serve your busyness just as well!"
Hard not to be dazzled by her workshop.
Wood ash might not be the most glamurous fertilizer out there, but still effectively reduces the required soil for your crops.
Always keeps his temper in check.
Can't spare any more room for crops? These chemically developed fertilizers have been designed to extend your soil's potential to the full.
Don't worry if she seems cold.
His pralines have snap on the outside, but pillowy centres.
He'll dip anything in chocolate to keep the customers happy.
SuperPhosphate Fertilizers - The Best in Use
You will not believe your eyes after applying our Superphosphate fertilizers to your farms: crops will sprout from your soil like it's the Garden of Eden!
The croquembouche of chocolatiers, she towers above the rest.
Bony livestock? With these vitamins, your animals should be nice and round in no time.
Gennaro Garibaldi - Chocolatier by Royal Appointment
"Your hare is chocolate fondue!" shrieked the young Queen, as she pushed his 7-metre "Osterhase" into the fire.
No one wants animals to die… At least, not ahead of time! Prevent sickly livestock from succumbing to disease with these antibiotics.
Anthrax Vaccine - The First Animal Vaccine
Lost count of how many livestock assets you have lost to anthrax? This vaccine will ultimately get rid of the bug and protect animals, population and investments alike.
Though it's held in an unspectacular flask, there is something terrifically odd about Margaret Hunt's cure.
Sneak up on poor snoozing whales.
Has seen colours you would never imagine in stone.
Portrait of the Artist as an Old Man 2 — Art Thieves
Portrait of the Artist as an Old Man 3 — Auction
You have no more space to leave your livestock strolling around? You can now cram them all up in these stables!
Wants to put his graduate research to use.
Doesn't even bother with anything less than 15 carats.
Perfect for navigating narrow channels where whales come to sleep at night.
He's your man when the record's stuck.
The incredible jeweller of queens. Entire fleets have sailed from every corner of the world for just one his dream-like tiaras.
Your livestock won't want to go anywhere else—nor will they be able to in these fully equipped barns!
He's always been drawn to the field.
Instead of its usual workforce, the building employs Worker Workforce.
The evidence suggests she's a very bright spark indeed.
So smooth in the water, the bowhead cannot hear you as you approach its shoreline bed. Poor whales.

Still treating your livestock like living beings? You can leave that in the past and make sure they are productively fat and packed into the tiniest space possible thanks to these revolutionary feedlots!
He is a beacon, positively crackling with big ideas.
Can't stand the stench of your livestock farms? This will keep it covered and contained.
Never forgets to bring a nice tray of cupcakes for everyone.
An effective Inuit harpoon when sealing, says Qumaq.
Manage your livestock waste in a clean and sustainable way by burying everything under this cover. The peak of hygiene!
Johan famously gathers anything he can find, glues it all together, and hey presto!
You would never believe what she can do with the right piping bag.
The most effective tool for skinning seals, incorporating thousands of years of Inuit knowledge and practice.
As elegant as waste management gets, this straw-mixed compost shed will cover the stench of your animal farms, leaving behind only green meadows and fresh air.
The Pyrphorians recognised her talent, but not her independence of thought.
If you can stand his infamous temper, he'll make your palate dance.
His name is known in every royal court in the world. Those who can afford a taste from his exquisite spécialités claim that it's like taking a bite out of heaven.
Your miners won't stop complaining? Add this freight elevator to lift their spirits.
Soft and silent, the arrow buries itself.
This steam-geared elevator that can lift up to ten tons in one go is the perfect addition to your mining industries.
His voice cheers even the laziest of workers.
Simon's latest elevator will dramatically reshape your mining scene! Performing solely on electricity, it has no rival amidst neither man nor steam-fueled machinery of its kind.
The arrow flies higher and higher, further and further.
A faint smell of dry leaves follows him wherever he goes.
Conducts lightning. His family (from Wittenberg) has the motto, "standing still is a backward step."
This mighty bow from the north west is powerful enough to bring down a fully-grown moose.
Can identify every cigar brand in the Old World by their smoke alone.
Angela has an astonishing intellect, but it's her capacity to improvise that makes her really sparkle.
Her exquisite hand-rolled cigars have ended lifelong rivalries.
A safety precaution to kill bacteria before curing.
The gentle Habano magnate that took his workers across the ocean and founded the flourishing cigar manufacturing town of Vincencity.
Easy to operate by even the dimmest miner, this medium-sized auger is a very useful addition to your quarries' equipment.
The Forgotten Ones of the Renovation
A safety precaution to kill bacteria before curing. Now with improved temperature control.
A lover of no-fuss black coffee.
The stuff she makes would make a pirate gag.
Reaches the exact temperature required to kill bacteria prior to the curing process, but preserves the moisture in the meat.
Make a dent in your quarry industries with this steam-powered drill press that will easily bore through every kind of terrain.
Filtered through the ranks, the cream of coffee expertise.
Spends most of his time underground amid barrels.
Skins must first be treated, or clothes made from them will stiffen and rot.
Cecilia believes coffee and chocolate are the perfect combination.
His rum sells great in hospitals.
Marco de la Mocha - Coffee Bean Connoisseur
A native New-Worlder, Marco is now known across the globe for the remarkable espresso machine he invented.
Prides on being able to taste the difference between Chardonnay champagne and the stuff they sell at the local pub.
Awls make holes for needles to pass through to prevent them from breaking.
This drilling rig's powerful electric motor allows it to bore into the Earth's surface like no other machine ever created before.
Is your cloth production fraying? Your weavers will be able to operate this mechanical loom even in their sleep!
The Inuit store needles in these carry cases so they don't get blunted and are always close at hand.
Weaving by hand belongs in the past! With the appropriate power source and correct human supervision, these power looms can weave faster than the best knitter!
He's got a licence to distill.
Has served all kinds of people, from fancy investors to coarse sailors.
Roberts Loom - The First Viable Power Loom
The speed of a machine, the care of a master crafter! Easy to adjust and powered by electricity, the Roberts Loom is the fastest, most reliable weaving machinery even conceived!
His genial nature has found its way into his beer.
Knows every fermented and distilled beverage worth knowing in every continent.
Snow goggles that are both comfortable and durable.
Bill busts his chops to produce the stoutest of porterhouse stouts.
The grand entrepreneur that took the delicacies of wine to new lands and established a flourishing enterprise.
An engineer's gift. "I know, it doesn't look spectacular - but I thought a lot about this one, and I think it may work."
For those who spend a lot of time out in the snow with the critters, and who wish to feel at one with them.
Brother Hilarius - Purveyor of Monastic Mixtures
Hilarius' monastery has brewed since the early 15th century, yet they always strive for a blend of old and new.
Disarray reigns in your assembly factories? Put everything back in line with this steam-powered conveyor belt.
A decent tool for shaping wood in Arctic conditions.
Haven't you heard? The assembly line is the manufacturing process of the future! This one is powered by electricity and incredibly dynamic!
Has the technique all wrapped up.
Helped put out four fires, driving the fire truck.
Useful for smoothing wood surfaces in Arctic conditions.
He'll swear the secret to his sauce is chocolate.
The Industrial Revolution is here! With this entirely mechanised factory, you will set a new landmark for mass-production assembly factories!
Reduces the happiness required to call the Volunteer Fire Brigade.
Singled-handedly saved five people from the Great Sawmill Fire.
Useful for smoothing wood surfaces in Arctic conditions, and extremely comfortable in the hand.
Even the most meagre-looking ingredients can be made to go far.
Like a true son of the Earth goddess, Tlayolotl plants by the ancient calendar, and the corn grows like crazy.
Is your gastronomy a little bland? This oven should spice up your cooking factories.
The great headchief that commanded the legendary Dragon Slayers Brigade for more than thirty years.
Can carry half of her own body weight on her head.
Heat up your local cuisine with this fancy cast iron stove, fit for the needs of every delicious treat-making factory.
An average Inuit seamster is likely the best seamster you've ever met.
Born and raised in the fields.
Smith Electric Stove - The First Manufactured Electric Stove
Thermo-Electrical cooking made easier than ever with the all-electric Smith stove, the latest revolution in cuisine that will make every mouth water!
Prides on being able to pick five tobacco leaves with a single move of the wrist.
Has learned to waste nothing of the slain beast.
Are your beverage industries stagnating? This brew kettle will make your concoction process all the more bearable.
Can't stand the feeling of not having dirt under his fingernails.
Knows all the patterns perfectly, and doesn't waste a scrap of the animal's skin.
Fins, feathers or fur, Chantelle has prepared them all.
All you need to add a spark to your beverages is this steam-powered brewing machine! The shelves will soon be flooded!
Has grown fifteen different species of tobacco plants in his back yard.
Maxim "In the End" - The Grand Specialist of Delicatessen
Grand-duc of the bouchon, Maxime has pursued a very different career than his brother Alonso.
Get your drinks flowing with this electric pump! Its system will not only accelerate the process greatly, but improve the resulting quality as well!
Got up on a tree as a kid and decided that was what she wanted to do for a living.
Once the incomparable Arnarunn has knitted a superlative sleeping bag, it will never need replacing.
Lose sight of tiny beads and pieces no more using this magnifying glass.
Her gentle respect for flora led her to devote her entire life to studying and growing all sorts of plants.
This precision monocular allows your watchmakers to see every tiny tooth and detail, making detailed crafting both painless and flawless.
The dogs and geese won't bite him any more.
Has made an art of the cultivation of trees and plants, his flowering trees are considered living sculptures.

Refugees from Isabel Sarmento's Prosperity island

Isabel, dear child. You have grown so much since first I met you — the ferocious jaguar cub that you were. You had lost a brother, and I, a father. I still had the years on my side back then, and the bounce of a free man in my step. But I owe it to you to tell you, the price I paid for that freedom was a high one. I never found the courage to tell you before now, but as the ever-quickening spectre of death approaches, I believe it is time.

You always knew I had to be a runaway slave. Well, in order to escape the plantation, I had to kill a man. The one holding the whip. That man was your brother. I had to kill him to set us all free — a decision I have had to live with ever since, though I have to say, at the time I never saw it as a choice. I know I came to you soon after, bearing the gift he intended for you, your name and his on the label, and I told you the lie that he'd died fighting in the resistance. I said he'd fought bravely against La Corona. The truth is, he was just a kid who'd fallen into the slave trade like so many others.

Well, that's all I can really say. May you find it within yourself to forgive me for depriving you of your only brother. Either way, I shall continue to support you until I draw my last breath.

Yours, as ever,

Mr. George Smith.

Prosperous as ever during the tin rush, now left behind with the rest.
A hole within a hole. That's how much this place meant to them.
They came here for salvation; never did they find it.
They were the last to leave, but by then there was no town to feed.
The prospect of building a blooming town once filled this place with vitality.
Only ashes remain to attest that this was once a lively place.
Once refuge of a solitary man, one of the few that remained.
The remains of the camp left behind by the crew of the HMS Hades and Styx.
What's left of Sir John Faithful's makeshift quarters.
The water still passes through, as if it never existed.
Ran dry along with the rest of the town's lifeblood.
Hard to picture children playing in these yards.
Only strong liquor kept the miners going.
The bailiffs put hundreds out of work, desolation being their duty.
Only creaking wood replaced the sounds of the livestock.
The tin-pot dictator is first to leave when fortunes turn.
The owners gave up on them along with their hopes for a future.

The airship hangar is built in phases. Once complete, it can produce trade airships if you have a supply of gas.

Adds the ability to construct the Airship.
Provides heat over a limited area if supplied with coal.
A new wing for the palace. Increases the main building's range and attractiveness.
Local departments allow you to issue the policies and effects of the palace in your other cities.
The palace is not only a unique symbol of your empire's grandeur, but a place to improve and elevate your favourite city.
Tractors increase a farm's cultivation area and productivity while reducing the workforce requirement. Tractors also consume fuel.
Stores corn as fodder for your farm animals, increasing the farm's productivity.
Stores grain as fodder for your farm animals, increasing the farm's productivity.

From the high peaks of the New World, these animals showed adaptation to its rocky escarpments and cloud forests. The alpaca and its cousins, for example, have become friends to the human inhabitants of the region, with whom they have worked as pack animals for centuries.
Every time passive trade happens at the trading post, there is a chance of gaining 5t of Gold Ore, Gold, Jewellery.
The colossal ruined cities of stone hidden beneath the canopy of the New World jungle. Learning more about these civilisations may help you to discover the long lost golden city.

Trench-scudding monstrosities of nightmare, these freakish denizens of the deep, formerly believed to have "accidentally fallen from the surface", will provoke gasps of horror and fascination from the public, while enriching your scientists' knowledge about the fauna of the abysses.
Ceremonial objects of the nordic culture that once spread fear and destruction along the shores of the Old World. Their skill at war, and fearlessness may inspire your own forces.

Fireflies of the deep, these bizarre organisms bioluminesce with such variety that those unacquainted with their existence are likely to be left feeling dazzled. The discovery and understanding of their luminescence can encourage your people to better beautify their interiors.

The forest creatures of the taiga— a cold northern coniferous forest. Understanding animals that are able to survive the long harsh winters on very little, encourages your people to show restraint in their own consumption.
The barren-looking deserts of the Polar region are in fact bustling with white fur and feathers. The sight of such a miscellany should encourage more people to take up exploration.
Ground-breaking geological discoveries that put into question our very origins! Serving as an open university, your museum's revelations may result in reduced attendances at church.

A protohistorical civilization from the north west of the Old World, known for its stone circles and magical forests. The inherent beauty of your quarries and forests may now finally sink in for the exhibition's visitors.

Not only do these fabled creatures exist, but in your hospitality have the chance to evade permanent extinction! That the tales are true will surely appeal to the romantic notions of writers in your city.

So, the stories were true! After all, what else could possibly explain these drowned memories of a forgotten time - fragments of those who lived on that great continent that once lay beyond the narrow strait. As the (highly questionable) origin of earthly civilisation, knowledge gathered from atlantean ruins may help your archaeologists determine the location of other lost cities.

Remnants of the day two vast empires clashed at the cape of Trelawney. Each sunken object a cenotaph to those who died on both sides; the servants of patriotism and duty, bound eternally with the sea. Reminders of the glory days may boost your own citizens' patriotism, even in the harshest times.
The Arctic tundra reminds your visitors of the challenging conditions those lost on Arctic expeditions have had to endure, a popular hot — or rather, very cold — topic at the moment.
Creatures of the abyss, these ocean killers you would not want to meet on equal terms. Your aquaria of marine predators can educate your people about submarine animal behaviour.
The calypso palms and bright corals of the westward isles. Visitors will enjoy tranquil walks in the azure seascape, hardly noticing the time pass. It may convince them to holiday for longer.
A greater insight into the Inuit and pre-Inuit cultures that inspires a sense of wonder and civic peace. An eye-opening exhibition that breaches the distance between two very different people.
From cubs to mastodons, all are powerless against the Arctic's freezing temperatures. Ice has preserved the pieces of this exhibition in a near-perfect state.

The full splendour of the ancient southern empire, known for buildings and infrastructure far ahead of their time. Recovering their history can better inform modern construction, and encourage your people to contribute more towards thier city.
Originating from the rainforest basin, the vivid colours of these animals are without equivalent in the Old World. It shall no doubt serve as inspiration to fashions in your city.
Some plants commonly found in marshes. Marsh plants can be poisonous and house mosquitoes and other creatures humans consider pests. Your people may begin to take more care in regard to hygiene.

Every time passive trade happens at the trading post, there is a chance of gaining 5t of Coffee Beans, Sugar Cane, Tobacco, Cotton, Cocoa, Caoutchouc, Plantains, Pearls, Chocolate, Coffee, Fried Plantains, Tortillas, Sugar.

The exotic fauna endemic to the eastern subcontinent, as encountered through the ages by merchants on the Silk Road. This display will no doubt attract similarly wealthy visitors from afar, perhaps even their exotic gifts!
The haunting funerary remains of a mysterious New World civilisation, unearthed for the public. A go-to destination for any leading figure hoping to be enchanted.
A collection of gigantic, colourful and sometimes edible plants that originated in the New World. This eclectic collection may stimulate an interest in fruit production among your people.
The first steps our ancestors took through the wildness of prehistory, on display to the public. Likely to help recover basic understanding of resource-gathering for survival.
While these farm animals may seem nothing special to most visitors, there still remains a lot to learned about breeding and caring for our domestic species.
To see the variety of animals living along the Great Coral Reef is extremely educational for young children, who, amused by the dolphins, better understand the complexities of life.
The golden age of piracy, and all the adventures that came with it. The romance of that fading age is likely to win the hearts of your sailors.
The distinctive religious architecture and mythological inscriptions left by the ancient citystates of the Aegean. Your people will soon want their famous tragedies to play in theatres.
Depigmentation, mutation or natural adaptation — what does it matter? These powder-white ghosts are a rare and wondrous sight when by chance they descend on a heavenly cloud.
Plants both beautiful and demure from the Near East. The wild, understated beauty of this display may provoke your people to have dreams of the exotic.
Every time passive trade happens at the trading post, there is a chance of gaining 5t of Coffee Beans, Cocoa, Plantains, Pearls, Felt, Bread, Grapes, Chocolate.
The divine and revered plants of eastern jungles. This sanctuary of sacred plants from afar may attract pilgrims who'll want to make offerings to these living deities.
The most common plants found in the icy north. Studying boreal flora may help your people better understand forest biomes.

A small collection of plants surviving in the arid mountains of the New World. The plants of the Andes have strong powers of water retention. Studying them may help your people to perfect agricultural processes.

The essential plants of medicinal gardens, as grown by monks in past times. Traditional medicinal plants have value even in a time of rapid scientific disovery. Studying them may turn up new cures and help people recover faster.

A fascinating collection of plants with darkly mysterious properties. The rediscovery of these witchy plants, and their use by humans, may rejuvenate the production of more socially acceptable vices in the city.
The cultural heart of your city is throbbing! Theatrical, musical, and literary events have gripped the place, to the great delight of your visitors!
The most gleefully-anticipated festival! The beer flows freely, and joy and good humour follow! Some like to call it Oktoberfest!
What's better than a bit of official mayhem once a year? Masked and fancy-dressed, your citizens can forget themselves and really cut loose!
Your population have rarely showed as much faith in their esteemed leader as today! They express their patriotism in honour of your great accomplishments.
In the Festival of Reason, anarchists come together to celebrate truth, liberty, community and the abolition of governments.
This traditional festival manifests in a magnificent feast for your citizens, celebrating a bounteous end to the harvest!
